Welcome to python-restclient’s documentation!¶

Everything you need to know about restkit

kit* is an **HTTP resource kit for Python, inspired by the microframework (Camping, Sinatra) style of specifying actions: get, head, put, post, delete.

Made by Enki Multimedia for one of our project and we decided to make it public.

Fisrt steps¶

  • Installation
  • Requirements
  • Getting Started
    • Perform HTTP call support with restkit.rest.Resource.
    • Perform HTTP call support with restkit.rest.RestClient.
    • Basic Authentification:
  • Console client
